The company works with entrepreneurs who were recently staff members. How to prove that not a scheme

05 Nov 2019, 16:57

Employees of the company took shape as an individual entrepreneur and began to provide services to the same company. For inspection, this is an unambiguous scheme. But there is practice when the company has proved that working with individual entrepreneurs who were previously employees is not a scheme at all, Tax Advocates share.
Perekrestok-Express has a grocery chain. The company launched a motivation program, in which employees could become managers and organize the trading process in stores. To do this, they had to register as an individual entrepreneur and conclude a contract for the provision of services on a fee basis. 12 Perekrestok employees took advantage of this and became IP managers.
The inspection decided that this was a scheme and charged over 14 million rubles. But the company and the IP fought back with the following arguments:

Entrepreneurs registered in this capacity on their own or contacted a law firm that helped them register;
Individual entrepreneurs themselves searched for employees in stores and executed them on their own behalf, and not on behalf of the Crossroads. Individual entrepreneurs also resolved personnel issues in terms of training, transfer to another position, etc.
Individual entrepreneurs themselves searched for contractors (cleaning, security) and entered into agreements with them on their behalf;
IP from their own funds bought uniforms, inventory, equipment, etc. The Crossroads did not return them these funds later;
IPs controlled the quality of store services, since the income of the IPs themselves depended on it;
Inspection interrogated the staff of the store. It turned out that they understand that they work precisely with an individual entrepreneur, not at the Crossroads;
After IP began to manage some stores, revenue in these stores increased by 22.1%, while expenses increased only by 5.2%. The economic feasibility of transferring stores under IP management is obvious.

This is a good practice that should be adopted by all companies working with individual entrepreneurs who were previously employees of these companies.
